projects.title: Trackademy
projects.description: A comprehensive learning management platform combining task tracking with community engagement and social features.
projects.longDescription: Trackademy is a full-stack learning management platform that revolutionizes how users manage their learning journey. It combines personal task tracking with community-driven learning, featuring searchable learning communities, social interactions, and comprehensive progress analytics. Users can create and manage learning tasks while engaging with like-minded learners in specialized communities.

projects.title: SkillSwap
projects.description: A peer-to-peer platform where users exchange skills with real-time chat, smart matching, and rating system.
projects.longDescription: SkillSwap revolutionizes skill exchange by connecting users who want to teach and learn different skills. The platform features intelligent matching algorithms, real-time communication, and a comprehensive rating system to ensure quality interactions.

projects.title: DevConnector
projects.description: A full-stack social networking platform for developers with GitHub integration and professional profiles.
projects.longDescription: DevConnector is a comprehensive social networking platform designed specifically for developers. It integrates with GitHub to showcase repositories, enables professional networking, and provides a space for developers to share their experiences and connect with peers.

projects.title: ShopSphere
projects.description: E-commerce platform with advanced filtering, cart management, and comprehensive admin dashboard.
projects.longDescription: ShopSphere is a full-featured e-commerce solution with advanced product filtering, secure payment integration, comprehensive order management, and a powerful admin dashboard for managing products, categories, and customer orders.

projects.title: Task Organizer
projects.description: A dynamic task manager with features like create/edit/delete and status tracking for personalized user access.
projects.longDescription: Task Organizer is a comprehensive task management application that helps users organize their daily activities efficiently. The application features secure user authentication, optimized state management, and an intuitive interface for managing tasks with different priority levels and status tracking.
